# The pivot_wider() Function

The pivot_wider function is a useful tool for transforming tidy data into a wider format. It is an improved version of the spread() operation from the tidyr package and expands to more than two columns from the input data.

The pivot_wider() function is a part of the tidyr package version 1.0.0 and above.
